title: Russell WIlson
description: You have a passionate obsession to be the best, while also projecting an air of calm and cool.

title: Jimmy Graham
description: You have overcome a lot of adversity in your life and achieved success, because what doesn't kill you makes you stronger.

title: Richard Sherman
description: You are loud and brash, never at a loss for words. You are good at what you do, but why let that speak for itself when you can, too?

title: Earl Thomas
description: You are a meticulous planner and have a ferocious drive to not only be the best at what you do, but also redefine your line of work.

title: Kam Chancellor
description: You are great at what you do, but you also appreciate the spoils that come with a job well done.

title: Marshawn Lynch
description: You are quiet, an enigma perhaps. But thereâ€™s clearly a deep reservoir of emotions churning within you. To your peers, you are universally beloved because they find you authentic.

title: Jon Ryan
description: You appear to have a quirky side to you, but you just like to have fun and try different things.

title: Pete Carroll
description: You are a passionate leader with a zeal for life. As soon as you enter a room, there's a jolt of energy.

title: Michael Bennett
description: You are vocal, opinionated and the biggest jokester in your circle of friends. But you also know how to fit in and push others to succeed.
